About


Welcome, fellow hackerman! I am Altelus (a.k.a. FriedTempura). I do various types of writeups from different CTFs (Capture The Flag) I joined. I mainly do reverse engineering and memory corruption type of writeups but I also do other categories.
Enjoy your stay, hackerman! May the Special Secret Society of Hackermans (SSSoH) live within our hearts forever.


You may contact me at this address : dark_symmetra@protonmail.com My Github : Altelus Github

Special Thanks - b2a3e8 for the console theme
